name: ARC CMS system
short_description:
ABOUT ARC CMS -
The ARC system will be an open source content management system based on the Yii framework. 
This will be a combination of ideas from: concrete5, drupal and wordpress all rolled into one. 
We do not want a clone but a very specific system that will be thorough yet simple and specific.

Our system will combine the following:
Yii framework
Portal
Forums (powered with MyBB)
Article system
Gallery system
Download system
SEO
Ad manager
Social plugins (facebook, google+ etc...)


THE ARC TEAM -
Chris Seman
Alien7up
mmathers
aventura

t_virus



GET SUPPORT -

Want to join our team?

http://goarc.org/community/forum-18.html
summary: A free cms system built with Yii framework and mybb.
